General.Name: Zuming Bean Products Co Ltd
General.Description: Zuming Bean Products Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells soybean products in China. The company offers fresh soy products, such as tofu, thousand pieces, vegetarian chicken, dried tofu, oily tofu, etc.; leisure soy products, including leisure dried tofu, leisure bean rolls, leisure vegetarian meat, etc.; and bean sprouts, fermented bean curd, gluten, rice cakes, cherry jade tofu, mulian bingshuang, and other products. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
